document_data.name: Igan Sokol
document_data.mainbody: '''Igan Sokol''' was the quartermaster of [[Sokol Keep]] in [[Phlan]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Igan was a naive individual. At first, he considered all the stories about ghosts and treasure as just a game. After he befriended0 Grim, he became more serious and in the end became obsessed with uncovering the story of the keep.
